#include <bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;

int memo[2][505][505], A[505][505];
int t, n, m;


int cost(int x, int y, int turn){
	if(x >= n || y>=m)	memo[turn][x][y] = -INT_MAX;
	if(memo[turn][x][y]!=INT_MAX)	return memo[turn][x][y];
	memo[turn][x][y] = A[x][y];
	if(turn==0)	memo[turn][x][y] -= max(cost(x+1, y, 1), cost(x, y+1, 1));
	else if(turn==1)	memo[turn][x][y] -= max(cost(x+1, y, 0), cost(x, y+1, 0));
	//cout<<x<<" "<<y<<" "<<turn<<"-->"<<memo[turn][x][y]<<endl;
	return memo[turn][x][y];
}

int main(){

	//cin>>t;
	scanf("%d", &t);

	while(t--){
		for(int i=0;i<505;i++){
			for(int j=0;j<505;j++)	memo[0][i][j] = memo[1][i][j] = INT_MAX;
		}
		scanf("%d %d", &n, &m);

		for(int i=0;i<n;i++){
			for(int j=0;j<m;j++)	scanf("%d", &A[i][j]);
		}
	
		memo[(n+m)%2][n-1][m-1] = A[n-1][m-1];

		cout<<cost(0, 0, 0)<<endl;	
	}

	//system("pause");
	return 0;
}
